channel.title: Monitoring Minutes
channel.description: A daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy and macroeconomic developments. This AI-generated podcast transforms economic data into accessible insights, covering Banco de Mexico policy decisions, inflation trends, employment figures, and market expectations. Part of the Monitoring Monetary Policy in Mexico project, which demonstrates how automation and large language models can make specialized economic analysis more accessible and relevant.
channel.itunes:author: Alexander Dentler

item.title: February 12, 2026 - Pablo Rivas & Jorge Martínez
item.description: Daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy for February 12, 2026. Host: Pablo Rivas. Analyst: Jorge Martínez. Topics covered: news roundup, economic data updates, and central bank calendar. Covers 4 news items and 6 data topics.

item.title: Introduction to Monitoring Minutes
item.description: A deeper introduction to Monitoring Minutes. Learn about our data pipeline, AI voices, and what makes this podcast different. Featuring all five hosts explaining the project's goals, limitations, and vision for accessible economic analysis.
item.itunes:author: Alexander Dentler

item.title: Trailer: Monitoring Minutes
item.description: A quick introduction to Monitoring Minutes, your daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy. AI-generated, data-driven, honest about our limitations, and constantly improving. Subscribe to stay informed about Banco de México, inflation, employment, and market expectations.
